short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extensions to keep metamask users safe from phishing websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension to keep your metamask & NFTs safe from phishing websites.

The extension will display a big warning if you visit a website impersonating one of the following platforms :

Metamask
Opensea
nfttrader
rarible
superrare
foundation
niftygateway
mintable
fractional.art
genie.xyz
uniswap
collab.land
boredapeyachtclub
coolcatsnft

Stay safe!
